How do I get in touch with the central authority that controls Verus?

There is no central authority controlling Verus. Verus is a decentralized protocol that allows for assistance and interaction without any middleman. If you have questions or need help, you can join the community on Discord or follow on Twitter to connect with other users and developers who can provide support and guidance.
